The Volt Studios is a women-led, full-service digital agency. We are fast-paced, engaging, and fun. Our goal is to help businesses grow through amazing strategies, smart execution, thoughtful consulting, and expert marketing skills.

  • Creative Consulting (problem solving)

  • Conduct influencer outreach and manage relationships, with an expectation to generate at least 15% increase in brand awareness through influencer collaborations
  • Monitor and report on campaign effectiveness and optimize for results, with the aim to increase CTR by at least 20%
  • Use creative thinking to devise innovative marketing strategies that not only meet but exceed our clients' goals
  • Earned a B.S. or B.A. degree in a highly analytical or marketing area or similar

Well organized - you are organized and detail oriented

Timely - you work efficiently and meet delivery deadlines. You have a sense of ownership in your work.

Creative - you think outside of the box to come up with new ideas and expand your skillset to new levels.

Proactive - when you have an assignment, you hunt and search for excellent sources (inspiration, examples, etc.) to propel you to deliver amazing strategies, ideas, and execution. If you hit a problem, you search for a solution.
